title: Stylish City Escape in the Heart of Glasgow’s Central District
description: Step back in time to discover Scottish Victorian elegance and Glaswegian culture with an escape to the famed Hotel Indigo Glasgow, an IHG Hotel. Occupying an iconic 1800s power station building, the boutique bolthole is steeped in history and a pioneer in the development of this city. Spend your days exploring the buzzy streets lined with world-class shops, marvellous museums and historic theatres, before returning to share stories at the onsite Turbine 75 Bar & Kitchen.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Glasgow, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 75 Waterloo Street, Glasgow, G2 7DA, Scotland, United Kingdom

title: Five-Star Glasgow Spa Retreat in the Heart of the City
description: A verdant oasis in the heart of Glasgow, Kimpton Blythswood Square Hotel, an IHG Hotel, combines elegant old-world Scottish charm with indulgent luxury. Explore the elegant surrounding region of Blythswood Hill for a spot of high-end retail therapy, or be pampered with rejuvenating treatments in the soothing full-service onsite spa. For those looking for gastronomical delights, savour seasonal seafood dining options at onsite restaurant Iasg before retiring to a stylish guest room for the night.
location_description: Kimpton Blythswood Square Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 11 Blythswood Square, Glasgow G2 4AD, United Kingdom

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Glasgow Airport, Uk
title: Family-Friendly Stay Near Glasgow Airport
description: Hop off the plane and check straight into the cosy Holiday Inn Express Glasgow Airport, an IHG Hotel. Take the 24-hour express bus to Glasgow city centre and waste no time getting to know Scotland’s rich architecture and bustling culture. Bask in gothic cathedrals, wet your whistle at a whisky distillery or escape the city with a trip to the awe-inspiring Loch Lomond. When the day is done, reset and recharge with a drink from the hotel bar and jumpstart your next morning with a Grab & Go breakfast.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Glasgow Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: St Andrews Drive, Glasgow PA3 2TJ, United Kingdom

title: Scottish Countryside Escape with Pool, Hot Tub & Spa
description: Escape to the peaceful Scottish countryside with a stay at Holiday Inn Glasgow - East Kilbride, an IHG Hotel, perfectly located 20 minutes from the heart of Glasgow. Choose to spend your days exploring the sophisticated city bursting with magnificent architecture, world-class art galleries and museums, and a thriving shopping district, then retreat to this cosy resort to breathe in the country air and unwind by the swimming pool.
location_description: Holiday Inn Glasgow - East Kilbride, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Stewartfield Way, East Kilbride G74 5LA, United Kingdom

title: Iconic Glasgow City Heritage Stay within Central Station
description: Antique and chandelier-chic, there’s no better way to experience Glasgow's Victorian glamour than with a stay at the famed voco™ Grand Central Glasgow. There’s also no better location - the hotel is attached to Glasgow Central Station, and sights like George Square, the Style Mile and the Gallery of Modern Art are only a short wander away. Head to The Restaurant for a classic Scottish breakfast or share scones and champagne at the lavish Champagne Central Lounge.
location_description: voco™ Grand Central Glasgow, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 99 Gordon St, Glasgow G1 3SF, Scotland, United Kingdom

title: Sophisticated Glasgow City Escape Overlooking River Clyde
description: Surround yourself with the infectious energy of Glasgow - a sophisticated city that blends earthiness with modern delights - with an escape to Crowne Plaza Glasgow, an IHG Hotel. Launch into the city’s museums, discover bohemian beats and vintage style, and revel in delectable food and iconic pubs from your setting along the River Clyde. Satiate your appetite with a nourishing meal at Mariner Restaurant or end your day at the Mariner Bar with an evening nightcap.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Glasgow, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Congress Road, Glasgow G3 8QT, United Kingdom
